DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare anaesthesia ( back surgery ) use endotracheal intubation ( patient anaesthized supine position ) anaesthesia use laryngeal mask ( anaesthesia induce laryngeal mask place patient prone position operation table ) regard advantage , adverse effect time spend . The anaesthesia 2 group patient identical ( propofol , remifentanil , rocuronium ) . Two group 70 pt . include stud . The inclusion criterias patient 18-70 yrs. , ASA group 1-2 , normal airway , patient schedule back surgery estimate duration less 2 hour . Adverse effect ( related placement operation table i.e . pain arm shoulder , pain throat , blood sputum , irritation eye etc . ) time spend procedure ( anaesthesia , placement airway , surgery emergence anaesthesia register . The hypothesis method use laryngeal mask faster few adverse effect .
DOC.brief_title: Laryngeal Mask Endotracheal Tube Back Surgery Prone Position
